item.title: How To Connect to My Highscore?
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

annyone know wat do i put this red color? Here My Rank Link http://project-rune-rank.freehostia.com/index.php

it dosent show me all my level and name.

public static void createConnection() { try { Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver").newInstance(); con = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/highscores","root","YOUR DATABASE PASSWORD"); stmt = con.createStatement(); } catch (Exception e) { //e.printStackTrace(); } }
